input.sentences: the ribbons were on display | showing what they were for .
there were signs outside telling us what it could and could n't eat .
output.sentences: James took his family to the animal barn at the county fair where they saw ribbons displayed on pens and cages of the various winners.
His daughter was so taken in by a black pig that she squeezed between the fencing to give it a hug.
After he grabbed his daughter out of the pig pen, they visited the sheep.
The last pen held an auburn haired alpaca with a Mona Lisa smile.
After their tour of the barn, they were very hungry and looked at a sign to see where they could get something to eat.
